2024.title: EdgeAISim
2024.description: EdgeAISim is a Toolkit for Simulation and Modelling of AI Models in Edge Computing Environments.

2024.title: Jetson Orin Nano Super Developer Kit
2024.description: The NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano™ Super Developer Kit empowers the development of AI-powered robots, smart drones, and intelligent cameras built on the Jetson Orin series.

2024.title: BMC Helix Edge
2024.description: BMC Helix Edge transforms Internet of Things (IoT) Edge infrastructure management by providing an analytics and remediation framework.

2024.title: Open Edge Platform
2024.description: Intel’s Open Edge Platform is a secure, optimized open platform for delivering scalable edge solutions.

2024.title: OpenNebula 6.10
2024.description: OpenNebula 6.10 ‘Bubble’ features the first complete implementation of the Sunstone UI functionality on the FireEdge server.
